author: Reuters Editorial
title: Imperial Brands delays release of half-year earnings by two weeks due to coronavirus
description: Tobacco company Imperial Brands Plc said on Friday it would delay its interim half-year report for fiscal 2020 by two weeks to give auditors more time to prepare and review statements during the coronavirus crisis.
content:
(Reuters) - Tobacco company Imperial Brands Plc (IMB.L) said on Friday it would delay its interim half-year report for fiscal 2020 by two weeks to give auditors more time to prepare and review statements during the coronavirus crisis.
